title: Meat allergy from tick bites is on the rise—and US doctors are in the dark
description: The allergy, called alpha-gal syndrome, came to light a little over a decade ago.

title: US senator blasts Microsoft for “negligent cybersecurity practices”
description: Rebuke follows recent breach that exposed email accounts of US federal officials.

title: Android phones can now tell you if there’s an AirTag following you
description: Google says its own tracker ecosystem is on hold until iOS has the same protection.

title: Tesla exaggerated EV range so much that drivers thought cars were broken
description: Inundated with complaints, Tesla created "Diversion Team" to cancel appointments.

title: Waymo kills off autonomous trucking program
description: Ride-hailing will let Waymo focus on "near-term" commercial success.

title: Microsoft Teams + Office bundle leads to official EU antitrust probe
description: It's Microsoft's first formal EU antitrust investigation in over a decade.

title: Ultra-fast niobium batteries boast 6-min charge for Lotus Elise-based EV
description: Nyobolt's battery tech is meant for consumer applications, as well as EVs.

title: A nearly 20-year ban on human spaceflight regulations is set to expire
description: Commercial space industry argues for extension to moratorium on regulations.
